attributes.action: Ban left handed people from driving on the roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all know that there are too many cars on the roads.
Left handed people are also left eye dominent which means that they are less safe checking for gaps in traffic to pull out or over take.
Banning left handed people would reduce the amount of drivers by 10%, and take these dangerous people off our roads.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
